boardgame.name: Lords of Hellas
Владыки Эллады
boardgame.description: Enter the Dark Ages of Greece, ruled by mighty Gods wielding advanced technology. Control asymmetric heroes and choose your path to victory, either by strategic control or adventure style monster hunting and quests._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Build majestic multi-part monuments of Gods on the board and unlock their mighty powers that will help you win and survive the raids of monsters, who travel through land and rain havoc._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In Lords of Hellas, you control an asymmetric hero, developed by increasing his 3 basic statistics and gathering artifacts. The main statistics are:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Leadership that will help you to move your armies_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Strength that will empower you to successfully hunt for monsters_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Speed that will make your hero move faster_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Through the game you can choose from various actions and influence the game thanks to the mighty monuments of base Gods: Zeus, Athena, and Hermes. You need to strategically move your armies and hero as well as manage your actions in order to win._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players can win in various ways: by controlling area, temples, or slaying monsters that are wandering through the map and interfere in various ways. Once any victory condition is met, the game ends (there is no point system)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash;description from the publisher_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Game is still shrink wrapped. TITAN PLEDGE ALL-IN! Special edition for those, who want all expansions. Includes Core Box, all Stretch Goals, Terrain expansion, Lord of the Sun expansion, Atlas expansion, City of Steel expansion, art book and all miniatures pre-shaded in Sundrop technology. All games come from a private collection (non-smoking and pet-free environment). Shipping: All shipping is done via DHL. Shipping costs depend on size and weight of the parcel and destination. Payment: Within Germany I prefer the standard-bank-tranfer (IBAN). It is fast and causes no fees. Outside Germany Paypal (friend transfer) and bank-transfer are possible.

KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVES!!! Base game and Terrain Expansion in hand and ready to ship (new in shrink). Stretch goals will ship later this year. This bundle includes: Core Box (90 miniatures, 132 cards, ~160 other components) Terrain Expansion (22 miniatures) + ALL UNLOCKED STRETCH GOALS Alternative Map on reverse Additional Heroes: Odysseus, Cassandra, Cleito Additional Monsters: Typhon, Chiron, Siren, Python, Cetus Additional Monuments: Poseidon, Hades, Hephaestus, Kronos Secret Envelope Lords of Underworld expansion pack (Hades monument, 6 Warriors of Hades miniatures, 10 cards, 6 other components) Lost City expansion pack (5th player army, priest and hero - Cleito, map add-on, 10 cards, Colossus miniature and new mechanics) Kronos Rebellion expansion pack (players vs. player game mode, Kronos miniature, 40 cards) Warlord box with plastic insert for storing all of the stretch goals

reserved for Neptunerex

Summary: Kickstarter Mythic Collection with stretch goals, exclusives, and Sundrop. Core game and terrain are available *now* and stretch goals available when they ship. I am selling an extra copy of the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Mythic Collection_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; bundle of Lords of Hellas. It is new and unopened, is the Kickstarter edition, and includes everything listed as part of the Mythic Collection on the Kickstarter page: • Lords of Hellas Core Box • Lords of Hellas - all unlocked Stretch Goals • Art book • Terrain expansion • Sundrop pre-painted miniatures The stretch goals include the following Kickstarter Premium or Exclusive expansions: • Hephaestus • Kronos Rebellion • Lord of the Underworld • The Lost City (5th player expansion) • Heroes and Monsters • Pandora_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Box I have the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;first wave_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; items (which includes the Core Game, Terrain expansion, and a couple of extra bonuses) in hand now; all other items will arrive with the second wave which is currently estimated to occur late this year. (I offer no guarantees that the second wave will ship on time, but I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll pass along any updates I receive regarding schedule). I am willing to ship the first wave immediately and the second wave when it arrives, or hold the first wave and ship everything together -- your choice. In either case, you are responsible for actual shipping costs. If you live close enough that you are willing to pick up your game (I live in Cerritos, California, and work near LAX), I am willing to work with you to arrange a pickup to save on shipping costs -- and again, we can work out two pickups so that you can get your core game right away, or a single pickup when the remainder arrives. (Cash would be acceptable for in-person pickups.) I hope you enjoy your copy; I know I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve been enjoying mine! Feel free to contact me if you have any questions or would like to make an offer.
Titan Pledge Allin + All Stretch Goals

Absolute bargain!! This is a sale for the base game AND the terrain expansion. This retails for about £125 Please be aware that having played twice, and we are very careful, we have realised that there is a blue hoplite missing. This must have been missing when purchased. The buyer can obtain a replacement from the publisher and hence the low selling price. Shipping in the UK plus insurance will be £7 or you could collect from Lichfield in Staffordshire for free. Please note that due to the very heavy weight of this shipping overseas is likely to be very expensive indeed.
CORE game with any Kickstarter exclusives that were included. Also includes terrain expansion. The game has been opened and the tokens have been punched. Played once, perfect condition
